title: 2020 Week 8 Preview- DJ Trolls Gregg
itunes:title: 2020 Week 8 Preview- DJ Trolls Gregg
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler preview each upcoming game of week 8 starting with the highly anticipated Ravens-Steelers (2:14). Sessler gets excited about the 49ers and Seahawks matchup (8:04). Daniel Jeremiah surprises Gregg live to bug him about his chiefs and talk a little Chargers (14:07). The Bengals (57:23) seem to be getting better and Sessler is trying to catch up to a certain bandwagon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
